faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Is this service compliant with Google review policies?
faq.a1: Yes. We do not incentivize reviews or gate negative feedback. We only send to consenting contacts with an easy opt‑out.
faq.q2: What information do you need from me?
faq.a2: We need your business’s Google review link or QR code and a CSV list of customers who have consented to receive review requests.
faq.q3: How soon will my campaign be live?
faq.a3: We aim to launch within 48 hours of receiving your review link and list. Rush orders are prioritized.
faq.q4: Can you send emails in Spanish?
faq.a4: Absolutely. Our emails are professionally localized in English and Spanish to suit your audience.
faq.a5: If we miss the 48‑hour prep window before sending, you’re eligible for a full refund. Contact us for support.
faq.q6: How long do you retain my data?
faq.a6: We retain your customer data only for sending review requests and generating summaries. It is securely deleted 30 days after campaign completion or upon request.
faq.a7: Our Standard and Pro packages include up to two gentle reminder emails to increase response rates.
